personalInfo.name: Damien Aries
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer | Next.js, Vue, React, Laravel
personalInfo.summary: Experienced Full Stack developer with a strong background in Vue, React and Laravel. Proven ability to translate and develop designs into beautiful, high-performance, scalable web applications.

experience.description: Remote role at a SaaS travel e-commerce startup, working with a Laravel stack (JavaScript, TypeScript, Vue3, Vuex, TailwindCSS, PHP, Docker, MySQL).
highlights: Designed and delivered new features in close collaboration with Product and Design teams, using an in-house A/B testing framework to run experiments and optimize conversion rates.
Refactored and rebuilt the TailwindCSS layer for a major rebrand, translating Figma wireframes into pixel-perfect, responsive components.
Improved Core Web Vitals and SEO performance through technical optimizations, contributing to a 25% YoY increase in organic search traffic.
Conducted accessibility (WCAG) and performance audits to enhance user journeys and ensure compliance.
Maintained high-quality code with peer reviews, unit and end-to-end testing (Pest, Jest, Laravel Dusk).
Reduced technical debt by auditing legacy code, writing tooling to identify unused assets, and optimizing application performance.
Worked in an Agile environment with cross-functional teams to prioritize and deliver features efficiently.
Incorporated AI-powered developer tools including GitHub Copilot, Cursor IDE, and CodeRabbit to accelerate development and improve code quality.

experience.description: Focused on delivering high-quality web solutions with modern JavaScript frameworks, conversion optimization, and responsive design. Applied A/B testing principles, rapid prototyping, and close client collaboration to deliver features aligned with business goals.
